## DataViewMeasureValue interface

Represents a value of a measure/continuous axis for one row in a data view.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DataViewMeasureValue 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [axisName](./spotfire-api.dataviewmeasurevalue.axisname.md) | <code>string</code> | Gets the name of the axis, as declared in the mod-manifest.json. |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getFormattedValue()](./spotfire-api.dataviewmeasurevalue.getformattedvalue.md) | Gets a formatted string that can be used to display this measure. The numerical value is formatted using the formatting settings in Spotfire. |
|  [getValue()](./spotfire-api.dataviewmeasurevalue.getvalue.md) | Gets the numerical value of this measue. |
|  [isValid()](./spotfire-api.dataviewmeasurevalue.isvalid.md) | Returns a boolean that is true if this value is valid and false otherwise. A value can be invalid if it cannot be computed for instance due to missing/invalid data. |
